Description: The unique id of contract which customers is holding. This contains number of contract & product code & category code& branch code.
The customer code which record in t24 system
the product code of the bond which customers are holding and this is combined by bond code & category code
The type of bond which the different characteristics: term of interest amount/flexible trading or not.
The sub-category bond which divides bond into many kinds by issuers.
The full name of issuer of Bond code. This show who issues these bond to the market for customer.

Description: The start date of contract which it was published into the market at the first time
The end date of contract which is the end term
The start date of contract which customers buy it for the first time
The end date of contract which is sold out with eop_bal = 0
Interest paid date due to the schedule of bond contract
the end date of period to calculate the interest amount due to the schedule of bond contract
the open date of period to calculate the interest amount due to the schedule of bond contract
The interest rate of bond paid to the customer who hold bond contract
Basic number date to calculate the interest amount: 365/366 or actual day in year
Unit amount of a Bond (10.000vnd/bond)
The unique code of TCB branch which generated on T24 system and the arrangement was recorded in that branch. It contains BNK/LHA/TLG...
The customer code generated in T24 system of saler who support directly customer to deposit money into Techcombank
The customer account generated in T24 system of saler who support directly customer to deposit money into Techcombank
The customer account generated in T24 system of saler who referred to support customer to deposit money into Techcombank
The customer code generated in T24 system of saler who referred to support customer to deposit money into Techcombank
Contract / Arrangement unique identifier. Hash from arrangement unq_id_src_stm and src_stm_id
Involve party unique identifier. Hash from invole party unq_id_src_stm and src_stm_id
